article:
The following is a selected list of rose varieties and cultivars which have
gained the Royal Horticultural Society's Award of Garden
Merit.

Dimensions show the maximum height times the maximum spread in square metres.

see also

*Rose (main encyclopedia entry on roses) *Garden roses *List of rose cultivars
named after people
